features: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: Clinically proven, silicone sheet is a particularly effective ingredient in scar treatment, and being recommended by plastic surgeons, burn centers, and dermatologists. With HANASCAR Silicone Sheets, it's estimated to remove the existing scar in 3-6 months and new scar in 8 weeks.

FOR ALL TYPES OF SCARS: HANASCAR Silicone Sheets has been proven to improve the color, size, texture, and overall appearance of many types of scars including c-section scar, acne scar, cosmetic procedures scar, stretch marks as well as burn scar and injuries scar, bring back a beauty skin.

WORK ON NEW AND OLD SCARS: HANASCAR Professional Silicone Scar Removal Sheets works on both the new scars and visible older scars, ideas for all types of skin. With powerful scar treatment formula, silicone sheets soften and flatten scars on your skin.

CONVENIENT SILICONE FILM: HANASCAR Professional Silicone Scar Removal Sheets provides the soft, flexible and breathable silicone sheets, can be used as a silicone tape, and able to apply on joints, acne as an acne treatment with great breathability.
SAFE & EFFECTIVE: Created with natural ingredients, HANASCAR Professional Silicone Scar Removal Sheets does not cause irritation on the skin, can be used for sensitive skin and even children.
body.description: HANASCAR Professional Silicone Scar Removal Sheets is indicated for use in improving the appearance of raised and discolored scarring and damaged skin, brings you a beauty and fresh skin . Each silicon sheet is self-adhesive, with clear, see-through backing for easy, convenient use anywhere on the body.How to use:Wash and dry existing scars or newly healed wound area.Tear the paper packet and remove the scar sheet.Bend the scar dressing to reveal the split in the clear protective liner.Peel away the protective liner from the adhesive silicone gel.Apply silicon sheet with adhesive silicone gel side down, toward the scar, completely covering the scar area.Remove, wash, rinse and dry silicon sheet daily. Reapply.Duration of Therapy:8 weeks for new scars, 3 - 6 months for existing scars.Ideal for:- Keloid Scars and Hypertrophic Scars- C-Section Scars & Stretch Marks- Insect Bites scars- Surgery scars- Burn scars- Acne scars- Cosmetic procedures scars
